page.title: 12THE MACE SUPERMARKET
page.content: We went and interviewed Mace,the supermarket. 5oo people each week go into their shop to buy drink,food etc:The item they sell the most is baked beans.Their most expensive item is a bottle of Gin the lowest price is a box of matches at 6p.They get their stock every day but on Wednesday they get a big stock.10 people sometimes try and get in at closing time at about 7.00 and on Fridays they close at 9.00.They send their Mattersons and pork pies and things like that back when the dates are out and changes them for fresh.The stale bread they give to the boy over the road or they throw it away.They sometimes run out of cigarettes like John Player Special Superkings,Benson and Hedges and sometimes Tobacco.Here are some prices rich tea biscuits : 29p,sliced white bread: 45p,P.G.Tips 40 tea_bags: 49p.
